block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Opportunity Field Histories using SOQL query WHERE clause

Id
OpportunityId
CreatedDate
Field
DataType
OldValue
NewValue
input.query: OpportunityId= '#{_('data.salesforce.d94e9ea2.Id')}' and Field ='StageName' order by CreatedDate DESC

block.name: post_bot_message

blocks.section_text: Hi @#{_('data.workato_service.18e11b4e.reply.user.name')}, congratulations :confetti_ball: on closing your opp <#{_('data.workato_variable.7ae80583.opp_name')}> with *#{_('data.salesforce.d0a5bddf.AmazonPartnerNetworkRequest__c.first.AccountName__c')}*! We need the following information so that we can close this opp out in the AWS Partner Portal.

block.comment: Post one question to R7 rep

bot_command.name: Submit the R7 Rep Answers in APN Record
Submit the R7 Rep Answers in APN Record

message.attachment_text: *Did the AWS rep bring this opp to us or were we already talking to the customer :question:*
